key_findings.title: Telebirr Launch Had Significant Impact
key_findings.finding: Estimated +15pp impact on mobile money accounts over 2 years
key_findings.evidence: Historical data shows increase from 4.7% (2021) to 9.45% (2024)

key_findings.title: Competition Multiplies Effects
key_findings.finding: M-Pesa entry estimated to add +8pp to digital payments
key_findings.evidence: Comparable evidence from Kenya/Tanzania duopoly markets

key_findings.title: Infrastructure Has Lagged Effects
key_findings.finding: Interoperability impacts take 12-18 months to materialize

key_findings.title: Composite Impacts Are Additive
key_findings.finding: Multiple events can compound to +25-30pp total impact

key_findings.title: Model Validation Shows Good Fit
key_findings.finding: Model estimates within 30% of historical observations
key_findings.evidence: Validation metrics available where comparable historical data exists

recommendations.recommendation: Establish regular high-frequency data collection for key financial inclusion indicators
Incorporate macroeconomic variables (GDP growth, inflation) for better contextualization
Establish baseline measurements before future regulatory/policy changes
Use model to simulate impacts of proposed regulatory changes before implementation
Create dashboard for real-time tracking of financial inclusion metrics

limitations: • Relies on proxy data where direct Ethiopian data is unavailable
• Assumes similar impact patterns to other East African markets
• Limited by availability of high-frequency time series data
• Cannot fully account for unobserved confounding factors
